extension.name: PLG_SYSTEM_COOKIESPOLICYNOTIFICATIONBAR
extension.author: Web357 (Yiannis Christodoulou)
extension.description: A beautiful and functional EU Cookie Law Compliance Joomla! Plugin that provides a mechanism for informing your visitors about how you use cookies on your website in an elegant manner. It includes a variety of features and parameters (responsive, multilingual, block cookies, change style, etc.). This Joomla! plugin is ready for the GDPR Compliance which has been already implemented on ‎25 May 2018.
